source_reference.text: Four Key Decisions for Loving Your Spouse for Life - Arlene Pellicane (Video by Focus on the Family)

content_summary:
Marriage—even with its challenges—doesn’t have to be hard! Arlene Pellicane looks at four key decisions you can make to strengthen your marriage and make your relationship with your spouse easier. When you establish solid ground rules, give thanks every day, seek to serve each other, and remember to have fun together, you can have a thriving marriage!

Get your copy of Making Marriage Easier: https://bit.ly/41aTA77

---

00:00 Introduction: The Challenges of Marriage
02:30 Camping Adventures: A Metaphor for Marriage
05:39 Four Decisions to Make Marriage Easier
10:45 Setting Boundaries and Respecting Rules
13:28 The Pool Table Lesson: Materialism vs. Gratitude
15:57 Marriage-Centered Home vs. Child-Centered Home
17:35 The Power of Forgiveness in Marriage
20:00 Showing Up: Commitment in Marriage
22:53 Get Your Copy of Making Marriage Easier
